name: The Island Odyssey! Hi Spec
description:
This is "The Island Odyssey! Hi Spec" originally designed for GearVR and Oculus Go but now playable on your Oculus Quest with full 6dof movement!

You need to enable developer mode on your Quest and sideload the APK provided here. You can use SideQuest to help you with installation on Quest.

A video review of the game can be seen here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H6g1mBMkzHg including some Oculus Quest reactions.

Freely explore this stunning virtual world at your own pace with unique controls allowing millimetre precision for real VR presence as you relax and unwind at The Island.

Ideal for anyone who likes to explore without wires in VR. The Island Odyssey allows you to enjoy a beautiful beach experience with a fun, interactive story based narrative. Complete quests, collect gold, go swimming, play piano, rescue sunken treasure and arrange a slap up, romantic meal for you and your loved one in this amazing trip to the gorgeous island and beach resort. 

Can be played with smooth locomotion, teleport or both for maximum comfort for all players.

6dof is enabled in game and smooth movement is recommended via the "A" button and controller for direction and speed together or simply teleport as both are enabled as default.
